sentences: Conclusions and decisions pertaining to COP agenda items are summarized in the relevant parts of this report.
However, there were also several items on which conclusions were adopted by the subsidiary bodies, but not directly addressed by the COP.
These items include: the SBSTA and SBI opening and closing plenaries, as well as their organization of work; and methodological issues.
This section provides details on issues taken up in the report of the SBSTA and SBI that were not taken up by the COP.
